title: Embracing Your Life
description: Embracing Your A Guide for Living with Gratitude and Appreciation is a gentle, yet thought provoking inspirational book that invites you to connect with your heart, by offering creative couplings of visual and poetic inspiration. Reflective quotes, passages, and affirmations, from renowned poets, writers and philosophers are paired with vibrant illustrations, inviting you to search within, and reconnect to what is truly important the relationship to your Divine Self. Prose and picture compliment each other, crafting a unique tone one very page. Embracing Your Life bridges the gap between mind and soul, thoughtfully weaving a conscious connection between love and compassion, dreams and creativity, spirit and self. It is an effective, meditative tool, which asks us to slow down and remember that it is the little moments that make a life.
author: Jenny Vainisi
